MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY15 postcode area of Cupar, affecting properties in Asher Park and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have replaced a blown fuse and are currently arranging generators and we now expect your supply to be restored by 12pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:23 AM on Monday, 15 March 2021..
